channel.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
channel.description:
I know this doesn't relate half-life or anything but I didn't know where else to post and i'm to lazy to sign up for minecraft forums. So I thought, why nost post in the friendly black mesa community forums!
This is a song I made over the weekend because I was bored and I also LOVE minecraft ^_^ I began recording myself on the paino and singing on Saturday and added in effects on Sunday. the "effects" are straight from the minecraft jar file. It was a pain converting all the ogg files to wav.! Anyways, it just got done uploading the song to you tube and I whant everybody to know about this. Watch it below!
-> [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u4xx0mLwqjw[/url]
(I know "crafty speckles" what kind of name is that? I don't know what I was thinking at the time lol :slight_smile: )

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: Combine
item.description:
Piefish:

Britfag here

Basketball is one of those sports that only America really cares about

Along with Baseball, softball, nascar, American Football and ice hockey

You’re lucky there aren’t any Japanese or Canadians here.

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: King_Kaddo
item.description:
GravityGun:

Can’t we all just… get along? I’m gonna make song
for everyone who thinks your wrong.

It started with a thread.
from a song in my head.
that turned into a debate.
of unappreciated hate.

I sit back and see.
with a keyboard in my hand.
what this can turn out to be.
it ends with a quick stop demand.
I’m singing solo with the best I can.
This isn’t bleeping studio land.

Why you say no to the voice?
An uninformed decision choice?
You can’t sit back and see.
how people willingly disagree to
not to be on my side with me.

I don’t care how this ends and
I don’t have see.
Good people turn around and end up
upside down without glee.
As far as I know it’s my decision.
to never click this forum and come
up with a revision… and i’m done now. dang about 20 minutes to write that

Rise and Rise until vaginas turn dicks :fffuuu: Oh god

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: szparrow
item.description:
Studying on a public university is completely free in Poland. But this didn’t stop my sister from going to UK to study. Your higher education is much better.
But she doesn’t want to stay, she says she’s sick of England. I wouldn’t want to live there either, I rather prefer this:


than this:

(Altough I loved Alton Towers)

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
I want to move to Japan, so I don’t have to pay some crazy as shit uni fees.

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: Piefish
item.description:
szparrow:

It’s good we have the ability to work abroad. We have some unemployment issues, low wages and high prices. But i don’t think about leaving. Living here is not sunshine and rainbows, but other countries have their issues too, dont they?

Some people just want to get away. The UK has its problems and I’d like to move to Australia but Australia has its problems too. You don’t always have to go somewhere based on politics I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: Piefish
item.description:
Flatline:

And I’ve never met a Pole that didn’t have a fantastic work ethic. Not like the perpetual dole sitters you get over here. Imagine having several generations in a family where no-one has had a proper job.

This is the truth, The Polish from what I’ve seen are bloody hard workers.

Also

GravityGun:

Can’t we all just… get along? I’m gonna make song
for everyone who thinks your wrong.

It started with a thread.
from a song in my head.
that turned into a debate.
of unappreciated hate.

I sit back and see.
with a keyboard in my hand.
what this can turn out to be.
it ends with a quick stop demand.
I’m singing solo with the best I can.
This isn’t bleeping studio land.

Why you say no to the voice?
An uninformed decision choice?
You can’t sit back and see.
how people willingly disagree to
not to be on my side with me.

I don’t care how this ends and
I don’t have see.
Good people turn around and end up
upside down without glee.
As far as I know it’s my decision.
to never click this forum and come
up with a revision… and i’m done now. dang about 20 minutes to write that

Leave now. No seriously I will make it my life ambition to kill you 0_0

Read full topic

P.S. Oh, thank’s for the free housing and crap, thousands of poles love you for it

And I’ve never met a Pole that didn’t have a fantastic work ethic. Not like the perpetual dole sitters you get over here. Imagine having several generations in a family where no-one has had a proper job.

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: szparrow
item.description:
I’ve been in the UK twice, and I’ve seen a country that got very laic. You should visit Poland - now that’s what you can call “christian country”. Just a pity it’s catholicism.

P.S. Oh, thank’s for the free housing and crap, thousands of poles love you for it

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: Piefish
item.description:
The UK is too PC, not that I’m saying people should only worship one religion (they shouldn’t worship make believe friends at all IMO) but the fact that this is mostly a christian country and that people who have come here from another country get offended by the religion that is here so we have to tone it down so they don’t get offended is ridiculous.
That and giving everyone who comes from another country with a “sad story” a free house and crap.
I’d just like to clarify I am not racist, if you come to the country and work like everyone else and don’t get everything for free then there’s no problem with you, it’s the people that come here and get everything for free and don’t work or do anything.

Also there’s fucking tractors everywhere in the UK and the farmers always Always ALWAYS spray shit over the fields when it is a warm sunny day.

Read full topic

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
DethklokSoldier:

And now all of these stupid, inbred, redneck, ignorant, mother fuckers are trying to get Islam outlawed in this country. If that happens, I’m leaving, because then my nation, which I was once so proud of, will no longer exist. If you want to show true religious tolerance and religious freedom, you let EVERYONE worship ANY WAY THEY WANT, and if you don’t like it, GET THE FUCK OUT OF MY COUNTRY! This is AMERICA, THE LAND OF THE FREE, and the HOME OF THE BRAVE, not AMERICA, LAND OF THE INTOLERANT AND HOME OF THE IGNORANT.

Visit london.

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.description:
Well, with any luck the Yellowstone super volcano should take care of most of the problems whenever it goes off.

Read full topic

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: szparrow
item.description:
I’m afraid that the country you are so proud of died sometime after WWII. Then it became the imperialist world police, a land of fat people in gas-hungry cars, a land of racist pricks and overly patriotic dumbasses who think that Europe is a country, etc. etc.

So yea, your country kinda sucks. But i’d still like to visit California. California’s awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: My New Song I Love Minecraft

item.title: My New Song I Love Minecraft
item.dc:creator: DethklokSoldier
item.description:
szparrow:

Living in the COLOR=‘Black’ void beyond the normal world must be hard

Honestly the USA is starting to suck really bad since a lot of what this nation once stood for is being corrupted, distorted, and destroyed. One of the major things that this nation was founded on was freedom of religion, and that has been destroyed almost completely. Whenever a store wants to display a nativity scene, people think that they aren’t being sensitive to other people’s freedom of religion. I say that is bullshit. If they are so offended by other people’s religions, move out of the fucking country and go to some nation that only has one religion. And now all of these stupid, inbred, redneck, ignorant, mother fuckers are trying to get Islam outlawed in this country. If that happens, I’m leaving, because then my nation, which I was once so proud of, will no longer exist. If you want to show true religious tolerance and religious freedom, you let EVERYONE worship ANY WAY THEY WANT, and if you don’t like it, GET THE FUCK OUT OF MY COUNTRY! This is AMERICA, THE LAND OF THE FREE, and the HOME OF THE BRAVE, not AMERICA, LAND OF THE INTOLERANT AND HOME OF THE IGNORANT.

Read full topic

Read full topic

I am dead tired too so no I have no sympathy

Read full topic
